quiz.question: Which collaborative communication product Google launched in 2009 then discontinued soon after?

Which bitcoin exchange collapsed in 2014 after losing customer funds?
Which Ford vehicle launched in 1957 is one of the most famous commercial automotive failures?

Which major energy firm's collapse in 2001 led to the dissolution of accounting firm Arthur Andersen?
